summary: A simple test mod that adds a slinged sack to increase carrying capacity the cheapest way possible.
descriptionHtml:
Wanted to play as a beggar and wear ragged robes and ask all the NPC's for a septim, over and over?

Now you can complete the look with the Beggar's sack!

Item can be crafted at the tanning rack under the MISC category.

Here is an awesome mod by Jeenine that adds my beggar's sack to the homeless NPCs of the gameÂ http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67767/?
author: Ailouros

files.name: Beggar's Sack 1.1 hotfix
files.changelogHtml:
Revamped the crafting method to create the bags
Added a new material named cordage, obtained from linen rolls
Added an improved version of the slingbag with a wooden frame
